keyFactors.title: Line Movement
keyFactors.description: Line moved from Ravens -10.5 to -7 - significant movement toward Bengals

keyFactors.title: Burrow Return
keyFactors.description: Joe Burrow returning healthy - market potentially undervaluing

keyFactors.title: Public Overreaction
keyFactors.description: Ravens on 5-game streak has public overconfident

quarterBreakdown.description: Ravens scored first but Bengals responded
Turnovers started swinging momentum to Cincinnati

gameResults.whenCleared: Won outright - never needed the +7 points
gameResults.turningPoint: Ravens' turnover problems gave Bengals short fields

whatWentRight.title: Contrarian Thesis Perfect
whatWentRight.description: Fading public on Ravens was exactly right

whatWentRight.title: Burrow Delivered
whatWentRight.description: Joe Burrow returned and played great - 261 yards, 2 TDs

statisticalContext.vsPropLine: Won outright by 18, covered +7 by 25 points

postGameAnalysis.wasNormalVariance: Better than expected. We took +7 hoping to cover, won outright by 18. Contra Fund thesis was perfect - public was wrong on Ravens.

closingLineValue.verdict: Small CLV but massive win regardless

keyTakeaways: Line movement from -10.5 to -7 was signal
verdict: Perfect Contra Fund play. Faded overconfident public on Ravens, Bengals won OUTRIGHT 32-14. Covered +7 by 25 points. Thesis was perfect.
